option.name: DESCRIPTION
option.value: Deprecated config properties moved to DeprecatedConfiguration class Added ThreadLocal wrapper for ConfigurationContainer with reportFolder property as example TODO(1): create a non-static copy of each property from DeprecatedConfiguration class in ConfigurationContainer TODO(2): mark every copied static property as deprecated with corresponding JavaDoc comment TODO(3): update all the code in Selenide to replace Configuration.<property> with Configuration.get().<property>
